name: create-readme
description: Automatically creates README.md based on package.json and other existing files.

addDesc: This package was heavily inspired by [package-json-to-readme]
It makes use of [http://rawgit.com/](http://rawgit.com/) to serve
to serve the module. Both are only suitable for small projects.
readme.addUsage: Configuration options can also be set in package.json's config.readme.

scripts.build: n-clean lib && coffee -c -o lib/ src/ && semantic-release pre --write-version && npm run create-readme
scripts.document:commit: npm run document:try-commit || echo "No changes committed"
scripts.document:try-commit: git add doc/ && git commit doc/ -n -m "docs: update documentation"
scripts.test: test-coffee-module -c && npm run document:check && nsp check
scripts.test:light: test-coffee-module && npm run lint && npm run document

author: Daniel Bartholomae <db@wappforge.com> (http://www.wappforge.com/)
